message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to revolutionize your business operations and significantly increase efficiency. Given its high value and potential impact, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering its unique features and benefits, I'm offering it to you for $15000. I trust this price reflects the true value it can bring to your company.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering its features and benefits.
